function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of defined roles in the health system for hospitals","Impact":"Inefficient coordination and response to contagious diseases outbreaks","Mitigation":"Establish clear roles and responsibilities for hospitals and healthcare professionals","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, communication platforms","People":"Healthcare professionals, hospital staff, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate personal care plans for managing long term care and anticipating acute needs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and inadequate care for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement personalized care plans and predictive care algorithms","Technologies":"Healthcare analytics, remote monitoring systems","People":"Elderly, individuals with chronic illnesses, long-term care residents","Owner":"Medical professionals, long-term care facilities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of recognition for the relevance of social prescribing","Impact":"Limited access to social interventions that support disease prevention and management","Mitigation":"Promote awareness and integration of social prescribing in healthcare systems","Technologies":"Health information systems, patient management platforms","People":"Patients in need of social support, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate working conditions for healthcare professionals","Impact":"Increased burnout, reduced capacity to respond to disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improve working conditions, provide mental health support, and ensure adequate staffing","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, workforce management systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, hospital staff, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Economic instability impacting public health and wellbeing","Impact":"Reduced funding for healthcare, social support, and disease prevention programs","Mitigation":"Reallocate resources to prioritize public health and wellbeing, implement sustainable economic policies","Technologies":"Budgeting and forecasting tools, economic modeling software","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, public health officials","Owner":"Government organizations, policymakers"}]}
